PAINTING | Fire protection to steelwork: all steel shall be in-tumescently painted in accordance with the Architect's specification and the Fire Consultants recommendations; fire protection: structural frames, beams and columns to achieve a minimum of 60-minutes fire resistance (load bearing capacity) in accordance with IS EN 1993-1-2:2005 (Eurocode 3) and ’Fire Protection of Structural Steel in Buildings’ by the ASFPCM and Steel Construction Institute; preparation: remove oil and grease, loose or unsound coatings; Intumescent coating system by Nullifire or equivalent; application in strict accordance with the manufacturer's instructions; Contractor to include for all necessary touching up on site; all in accordance with the Architect's, details and specifications & the Fire Consultant's Fire Safety Certificate Application - Compliance Report, details and specification. | Structural steel; | general surfaces; >300mm wide; (beams)
